name: Bad Turrets
description:
Bad turrets is a minimalist bullet hell game, test your reflexes and dodge the bullets.  Your only weapons are the keyboard keys.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "THE BEST GAME OF THE WORLD" - A friend of mine                                                                           "SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY" - Anonymous                                                                                "IS A GOOD GAME(?)" - A random guy   

If you find any bugs you can contact us at the following email address: prixelstudioita@gmail.com           

THE GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT, IF YOU WANT TO HELP THIS PROJECT CAN MAKE A DONATION, ALL THE PEOPLE WHO DONATE WILL BE INCLUDED IN THE END CREDITS.
